snippet: UPDATE 6:45 P.M.: Burning cables north of the Dekalb station are causing delays and reroutings. Transit officials recommend using the numbered lines where possible.
abstract: UPDATE 6:45 P.M.: Burning cables north of the Dekalb station are causing delays and reroutings. Transit officials recommend using the numbered lines where possible.

headline.main: Subway Fire Near Dekalb Station in Brooklyn Causes Delays
